original_text: Include one male goat as a sin offering, in addition to the regular burnt offering with its grain offering and drink offering.
korean_text: 상번제와 그 소제와 그 전제 외에 숫염소 한 마리를 속죄제로 드릴 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Include one male goat as a sin offering
sentences.korean_translation: 숫염소 한 마리를 속죄 제물로 드리라

sentences.original_text: in addition to the regular burnt offering
